com.kintone.client.model.record

Class TableRow

  • Object
    • TableRow

  • public class TableRow
extends Object
    A TableRow represents a row of Table field.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TableRow()
      Constructor for creating or updating a row.
      TableRow(Long id)
      Constructor to set the row ID.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TableRow

        public TableRow()
        Constructor for creating or updating a row. This constructor does not set the ID of the instance. getId() will return null.

      • TableRow

        public TableRow(Long id)
        Constructor to set the row ID. This constructor is mainly for internal use and for testing. To get a new instance for creating or updating a row, simply use TableRow().
        Parameters:
        id - the row ID
